channel.title: [zenith's] command request
channel.description: can i make a ::sellinv command so it selling your inventory and you get money for it? what code should i use then?

item.title: [zenith's] command request
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“killerjens9, post:6, topic:469364”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=586533.msg4164625#msg4164625 date=1353539594]

So, instead of fixing the shops like a normal person would, you decided to make a completely insane command? If you need help fixing your shop buying & selling prices pm me.

Or post what problems you’re having here.

@OP: If you want a command that sells the items, all you would need to do is go through each item in the inventory, add some coins for the value of the item, and remove it from the inventory.
[/quote] i don’t understand this is there no command like ::sellinv or ::sellitem (itemid) (amount)?[/quote]

Included? Probably not.

Read full topic
